body: Include the total number of entries in UpdatedFeed. Fix bugs in the entry_dedupe, readtime, and mark_as_read plugins. Fix CLI bugs. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-32) for details.
The `readtime` plugin has no extra dependencies. Improved `get_entries(sort='recent')`. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-31) for details.
Some backwards-incompatible changes. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-30) for details.
3.0 release candidate. Some backwards-incompatible changes. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-30) for details.

Deprecate `object_id` in favor of `resource_id`. Prevent rare "database is locked" errors when closing the reader. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-217) for details.

Threading-related improvements:

* Allow using a reader from multiple threads directly (no context manager).
* Allow reusing a closed reader.
* Allow using a reader from multiple asyncio tasks.
 
See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-216) for details.
Allow using Reader objects from multiple threads. Allow using Reader objects as context managers. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-215) for details.
Allow others to use mypy with *reader*. Drop Python 3.7 support. Support PyPy 3.9. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-214) for details.

`twitter` experimental plugin. Skip RSS entries with no guid/link instead of failing the entire feed. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-213) for details.
`readtime` built-in plugin. More plugin hooks. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-212) for details.
Fix reader not working with SQLite 3.38 or newer. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-211) for details.
Entry and global tags. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-210) for details.
update_feeds() memory usage reduction (~35%!). Minor web app improvements. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-29) for details.

New unified tags API. Deprecate the old feed tags/metadata APIs. Web app memory usage improvements. See the [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-28) for details.

Unify the tag and metadata namespaces. Rename `mark_as_read` config metadata. `before_feed_update_hooks`. `global_metadata` plugin. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-27) for details.

Filter feeds by feed, tags, broken, and updates_enabled in update_feeds()/update_feeds_iter(). Filter feeds by new in get_feeds()/get_feed_counts(). Lower update_feeds() memory usage on Linux. Add support for CLI plugins. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-26) for details.
User-added entries, feed URL validation, PyPy 3.8 support, bugfixes; see [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-25) for details.
Enable search by default. Store feed description and version. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-24) for details.

Python 3.10 support. `entry_dedupe` now deletes old duplicates. Fix for `entry_dedupe` bug introduces in 2.2. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-23) for details.

Approximate matching for `entry_dedupe`. After feed update hooks. Entry read/important modified timestamps. See [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-22) for details.
Entry count averages. See the [changelog](https://reader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#version-2-1) for details.
Backwards incompatible changes (API clean-up). See the [changelog](https://reader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#version-2-0) for details.
`after_entry_update_hooks` plugin hook is now public; bugfixes; full [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-120).
Drop Python 3.6 support. Support PyPy 3.7. Various bugfixes and deprecations. See the [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-119) for more details.
Pre-2.0 deprecations, minor bug fixes. There are some **minor compatibility breaks**, see the [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-118) for details.
Reserved tag and metadata keys, mark_as_read becomes a built-in plugin; [full changelog](https://reader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#version-1-17).
Built-in plugins; [full changelog](https://reader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#version-1-16).
Update entries based on content changes; [full changelog](https://reader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#version-1-15).
update_feeds_iter(), better reader update command, make_reader(session_timeout=...); [full changelog](https://reader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#version-1-14).
JSON Feed support; parser refactoring. Disable log output by default. [Changelog](https://reader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#version-1-13).
Pagination. [Changelog](https://reader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#version-1-12).
Allow disabling feed updates for some feeds. Allow counting feeds and entries. [Changelog](https://reader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#version-1-11).
get_entries() indexes, search_entries(sort='random'), finished user guide, sqlite_releases plugin; [changelog](https://reader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#version-1-10).
Python 3.9 and Windows support.

Allow changing feed URLs, better error messages, minor plugin and web app improvements; drop feedparser 5.x support; see the [changelog](https://reader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#version-1-8) for more details.
Feed tag support, filter broken feeds, feedparser 5.x deprecation; see the [changelog](https://reader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#version-1-7) for details.
feed_root and config file support.
Search optimizations.
https://reader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#version-1-4
Error handling and id-less entries.
Chunk all the things!
Sort by random. Query builder.
Bugfix (#164).
Major release!
Better search, entry API improvements.
Web app plugins. Preview feed.
Allow updating feeds concurrently; extra filter arguments on the get_* methods.
Full-text search.
Deprecations and closure.
Important entries.
Static type checking, various bug fixes.
Drop Python 3.5 support.
Entry page.
Feed metadata support.
Plugin code unification.
Bugfix release, mostly.
Lots of refactoring; see [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-08) for details.
Sort entries by import date, enclosure deduplication plugin, plugin support in the web app; see the [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-07) for details.
Refactoring and minor fixes; see [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-06) for details.
Feed update performance regression fix and minor build infrastructure improvements; see [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-05) for details.
Mostly feed sorting; see [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-04) for details.
Deduplication plugins; see [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-03) for details.
Storage refactoring; see [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-02) for details.
Bugfix release; see [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-011) for details.
Initial release; see the [changelog](https://github.com/lemon24/reader/blob/master/CHANGES.rst#version-01) for details.
